author: Victoria
text: In light of a very emotionally charged case, Steve Brown stayed cool and focused on the facts, evidence and the Law, which is ultimately what brought us a victory. I have been very impressed with Mr. Brown's ability to dig into the details of the law in order to both, support our arguments, while at the same time, discrediting the opposing side's misstatements and incorrect application of the law. When you need an energetic and engaged lawyer who will cross every t. and dot every i. and who will insist that the opposing side stay on the, "up and up" Steven Brown is the Attorney to contact.
